casebody.data:
Donald Edward Owen, Jr., Employee, Plaintiff
v.
Bruce Hogsed and/or Tammy Hogsed d/b/a Hogsed Landscaping & Tree Service, Employer, Noninsured, and St. Paul Travelers/zurich, Carrier, and Sydney Bruce Hogsed and Tammy Hogsed, Individually, Defendants. No. COA15-1321 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 16, 2016

AFFIRMED.
